Interface GameModeStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassicModeStrategy, PuzzleModeStrategy, RevertedModeStrategy, TimeAttackModeStrategy
public interface GameModeStrategy
Strategy interface for different game modes. Each game mode implements its own initialization, win/loss conditions, and UI configuration.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize(Board board, GuiController guiController, SoundController soundController)
      Initializes the game mode with mode-specific setup.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board instance
      guiController - The GUI controller for view updates
      soundController - The sound controller for audio feedback

    • checkWinCondition

      boolean checkWinCondition(Board board, GuiController guiController, SoundController soundController)
      Checks if the win condition for this game mode has been met.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board instance
      guiController - The GUI controller for view updates
      soundController - The sound controller for audio feedback
      Returns:
      true if the win condition is met, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      board - The game board instance
      guiController - The GUI controller for view updates
      soundController - The sound controller for audio feedback
      Returns:
      true if the loss condition is met, false otherwise

      guiController - The GUI controller for view updates
